languages.text: {n}Огненные языки неохотно слизывают с книги налет ереси, теряя теплые цвета. Кровавый символ на обложке плавится, и вы слышите визг, такой громкий, что боль простреливает уши. В последней вспышке вы четко видите еретический знак, но секундой позже уже не можете вспомнить, как он выглядел.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Огненные языки неохотно слизывают с книги налет ереси, теряя теплые цвета. Кровавый символ на обложке плавится, и вы слышите визг, такой громкий, что боль простреливает уши. В последней вспышке вы четко видите еретический знак, но секундой позже уже не можете вспомнить, как он выглядел.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Огненные языки неохотно слизывают с книги налет ереси, теряя теплые цвета. Кровавый символ на обложке плавится, и вы слышите визг, такой громкий, что боль простреливает уши. В последней вспышке вы четко видите еретический знак, но секундой позже уже не можете вспомнить, как он выглядел.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

{n}The fiery tongues reluctantly strip the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the folio. The bloody symbol on the colour melts and you hear a shriek so loud the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but the next second you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

languages.text: {n}燃えるような舌が本から異端の染みを渋々ながらも拭い去り、書物を飲みこむにつれて温かい色が消えていく。表紙を覆っていた血塗られたシンボルは溶けて、鼓膜が破けるほどの大きな叫び声が放たれた。最後の瞬間、異端の印章の完全な姿が現れたものの、どんな形だったのかは一瞬で忘れてしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}燃えるような舌が本から異端の染みを渋々ながらも拭い去り、書物を飲みこむにつれて温かい色が消えていく。表紙を覆っていた血塗られたシンボルは溶けて、鼓膜が破けるほどの大きな叫び声が放たれた。最後の瞬間、異端の印章の完全な姿が現れたものの、どんな形だったのかは一瞬で忘れてしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las lenguas de fuego lamen con reticencia la herejía que mancha el libro. Sus colores se diluyen al devorar el volumen. El símbolo sangriento de la portada se derrite y oyes un alarido tan penetrante que el dolor atraviesa tus tímpanos. El último destello muestra la totalidad del símbolo hereje, pero al cabo de un segundo ya has olvidado su aspecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las lenguas de fuego lamen con reticencia la herejía que mancha el libro. Sus colores se diluyen al devorar el volumen. El símbolo sangriento de la portada se derrite y oyes un alarido tan penetrante que el dolor atraviesa tus tímpanos. El último destello muestra la totalidad del símbolo hereje, pero al cabo de un segundo ya has olvidado su aspecto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}炽烈的火舌不情不愿地舔舐着书页上亵渎的词句。在吞噬这本邪典的过程中，就连熊熊燃烧的火焰都失去了温暖的光彩。当烈焰开始融化封面上那个血红符号时，你听到了一声震耳欲聋的尖啸。在最后的火光中，那个异端符号终于现出了原本的样子，但你很快就把它忘得一干二净了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}炽烈的火舌不情不愿地舔舐着书页上亵渎的词句。在吞噬这本邪典的过程中，就连熊熊燃烧的火焰都失去了温暖的光彩。当烈焰开始融化封面上那个血红符号时，你听到了一声震耳欲聋的尖啸。在最后的火光中，那个异端符号终于现出了原本的样子，但你很快就把它忘得一干二净了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les langues ardentes lèchent avec réticence la souillure hérétique de ce livre et perdent leurs couleurs chaudes quand elles parviennent à engloutir l'ouvrage. Alors que le symbole sanglant qui orne la couverture fond peu à peu, un cri strident vous perce les tympans. Dans un dernier éclat de lumière, le sceau hérétique apparaît tout entier, mais quelques instants plus tard, vous êtes totalement incapable de le décrire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les langues ardentes lèchent avec réticence la souillure hérétique de ce livre et perdent leurs couleurs chaudes quand elles parviennent à engloutir l'ouvrage. Alors que le symbole sanglant qui orne la couverture fond peu à peu, un cri strident vous perce les tympans. Dans un dernier éclat de lumière, le sceau hérétique apparaît tout entier, mais quelques instants plus tard, vous êtes totalement incapable de le décrire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die feurigen Zungen lecken widerwillig den Makel der Ketzerei von dem Buch. Ihre warmen Farben verblassen, als sie das Buch verschlingen. Das blutige Symbol auf dem Einband schmilzt, und es ertönt ein solch lauter Schrei, dass der Schmerz dein Trommelfell durchbroht. Der letzte Blitz offenbar das ketzerische Siegel in all seiner Pracht, doch schon einen Augenblick später kannst du dich nicht mehr daran erinnern, wie es überhaupt aussah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}

Der letzte Blitz offenbar das ketzerische Siegel in all seiner Pracht, doch schon einen Augenblick später kannst du dich nicht mehr daran erinnern, wie es überhaupt aussah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ateş, kitabın kâfirliğinin lekesini gönülsüzce temizlerken cildi sarınca alevin sıcak rengi soluyor. Kapaktaki kanla yazılmış sembol eriyince duyduğun feryat o kadar yüksek çıkıyor ki kulak zarların sızlıyor. Kâfirlik sembolü, son bir parıltıyla tamamen gözler önüne seriliyor ama hemen ardından sembolün neye benzediğini anımsayamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fiery tongues reluctantly lap away the taint of heresy from the book, their warm colours fading as they engulf the tome. The bloody symbol on the cover melts, and you hear a shriek so loud that the pain pierces your eardrums. The final flash reveals the heretical sigil in full, but only a moment later, you cannot recall what it looked like.{/n}
